text: Aur Dost!! Hum log to bahut time se mauj karte aa rahe hain. Third year toh poora tumhare room par hi bitaya hai. Have had a lot of senseless and mindless discussions in your room :-D. Jokes apart, you have been a great friend to whom I could pour my heart out whenever I needed to.  Thank you so much for that. Tumne acads me bhi bahut baar assignment submit karwaaye hain. Last year me apan ne bahut brawlhalla aur among us khela hai. Aao weekend par bande ikatha karte hain!!! Take Care!!
author: Aviral  Shukla

text:
Hello Bhai.. You are the most dedicated and striving guy I have met at IITK. One who always goes for the right path rather than the easier. Hum logon ne saath me bahut mauj kaati hai, in the past 3 years.From the late night bulla sessions with Chemineers team, jo time ke saath choti hoti rhi (at least when we were in the campus), to the plethora of assignments and quizzes jisme pakka question me hi kuch missing tha, we had a great time.

It has been a hell of a ride and we still have an equally awesome year remaining. Take care!!!!!
author: Aviral  Shukla

text: Aur Bhai!! TA lab me toh bahot mauj maari thi apan ne. Have many great memories with you over the years. 352 me hum log ne ghanto lab me struggle kiya hai. You have always been a  delightful person. Keep being the same. Take Care.
author: Aviral  Shukla

text: Hello Bro!! I believe the first time I met you was in PHY102 Lab. I remember wondering, 'Mera lab partner nahi aaya, kya lab akele hi karni padegi'. It has been a great journey ever since. You have been a great friend to me. Bahut jagah apan ne 2 vs 1 khel kar mauj hi kar di hai. It has been a hell of a ride with priceless moments. The only thing I regret currently ki apan saath me trip par nhi chal paaye. Chalo still ek chance hai, apne dual wale saal me. Take care Bhai, looking forward to a great year with you
author: Aviral  Shukla

text: Aur Bhai Aviral!!!! Hum log to hamesha saath me hi rahe hain.  Roll number saath me hona to alag baat hai but apni lottery bhi har baar same hi lagti thi. UOP me toh bahut mauj kari thi. Hamari lab report har baar lab ke bahar cycle stand par hi complete hoti thi. TA me bhi apni canon bahut bakchod bani thi. CHE COM me tumne GD me kya phoda tha. We have had a lot of awesome moments together.  Lucky to have a friend like you. Take care!!
author: Aviral  Shukla

text: Hello Bhai, we have had some great moments in the past years. Courses me apni weekly partnerships chalti rehti this. Profs ko call par ghumane ki kala bhi seekh gaye the. Overall to sab theek rha that, bas ek course ke end me pakde gaye the. Yeh Harshit aur Prajjwal ke mind games ke beech me hum dono fase rehte the. Thank you so much for these pleasing memories. Take care.
author: Aviral  Shukla

text:
Hello Bhai, aur kya halchal?? Initially to apan ne bas saath me course hi kiye the. 3rd sem me tumne Thermo chaapa tha, 4th me apan CSO drop kiya tha. 5th me tumhara kuch system bigad gaya tha aur phir har samay JANuary-AUGust chalne laga. Phir Chemineers ke chote-mote kaand bhi hogaye jo Aniraban ko batane baaki hain.....
We have almost spent the entire 4 years together and have got a lot of great memories but the only question which is still remaining is "Ball swing kaise hoti hai???" :-D ;-D
author: Aviral  Shukla

text: Hello!! Hum logon ne bahut se courses saath me niptaye hain, wo bhi usually a couple of hours before the final exams. Have a lot of good memories of the sleepless nights at the Library. Take care.
author: Aviral  Shukla

text:
Hello Bhai, hum logon ki toh bahut memories hain. 352 me group project me, apan ne bahut struggle kiya tha. End me usme bhi sacchai au acchai ki jeet hui thi. Over the past year, we have done a lot of courses together jisme harki khud ki poori kahani hai. End tak padhai ke saath saath duniyadaari ka bhi lesson mil gaya :-)

It has been a great journey overall and thank you for being a good friend. Take care.
author: Aviral  Shukla

text:
Aur bhai!! Apni toh poori journey memories se hi bhari padi hai. First sem me ECO me saath shuru hua tha. Tab humlog wing me bahut mini militia khela karte the. Tumhari Vijit ki jodi sabko nipta diya karti thi. Phir to poori campus life saath me hi bitaai hai. Wo roz roz canteen ki trips aur raat ke 3 baje ke baad waali campus walks. Wahan apan saare kaand discuss kar lete the. Have enjoyed a lot of awesome moments with you.

"Sab chill hai" bol bolkar tum sab jagah chaapte aa rhe ho. Aage bhi aise hi mast rahna. I have been very fortunate to have you as my friend. Take care
author: Aviral  Shukla

text: Hello Bhai!!! Wo prob stats ka kaand to kabhi nahi bhul paayenge. Apni nok jhok to first sem se hi chalti aa rahi hai. Have a ton of great memories with you. Looking forward to an equally great year ahead. Take care. And haan, dekhte hain ki next year RCB jeet paati hai ki nahi :-D
author: Aviral  Shukla

text: Aur Dost!!! Haan Bhai, wo antaragini wala kaand to kabhi nhi bhul payenge. SIS ne hum logon ko mujrim ghoshit kar diya tha. Kisi tareh tumne aur Jindal ne convince kiya tha.  Hum logon ne SG wale time bhi bahut masti ki thi. Econometrics me Ram ke saath gajab fraud mara tha. Lucky to share so many great moments with you. Take care!!
author: Aviral  Shukla

text: Hello there!! You have been one of those few people in CHE jinse kabhi CHE discuss hi nhi hui. I remember many instances when we poked fun at the "Kitne Bane, Kitne bane" junta. You are a great person to talk to. We have had countless silly discussions, from how Gillian should spend the One Thousand Dollars to Five Ways to Kill a Man. Overall, I think it has been Much Ado About Nothing. It has been a hell of a ride until now. Looking forward to an even better year. Take care.
author: Aviral  Shukla

text: Hello Bhai!!! Bahut samay se humara saath chala aa rha hai. Have had some really awesome years with you till now and looking forward to many more ahead. Jab bhi free ho toh ghar ghum jao, jam ke party karte hain!!!!
author: Aviral  Shukla
